Country: United States State: Illinois City: Chicago ZIP: 60618 Salary: company desired Posted date: 4/12/2011 Posted by: Felixberto Jr. Saavedra Email: xwdx3a@r.postjobfree.com Contact Info: *********@*******.***

Resume Text:
Contact job seekers directly. Plans start from $19.99/month. FELIXBERTO SAAVEDRA JR.
Address : **** *. ********* ***. ******* , IL 60618 Cell phone Number : 850 *** **** Email address : xwdx3a@r.postjobfree.com
Position Applied: bellman/ valet parking attendant/ Laundryman Education: 1987-1991 Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering [Misamis University, Ozamis City, Phillipines] 1983-1986 Mechanical Engineering Technology [Mindanao State University, Iligan City, Phillipines] 1979- 1983 High School Graduate Lanao del Norte Compresentive School [Baroy, Lanao Del Norte, Phillipines] 1973-1979 Elementary Graduate Baroy Central Elementary School [Baroy, Lanao Del Norte, Phillipines] Work history: Feb 2008 – Feb 2011 Paradise Palm Resort – Panama City Beach, FL [Housekeeping Attendant/ Laundry Attendant Position] Duties&Responsibilites : Vacuuming, Dusting, mopping kitchen and bathroom details, along with surface cleaning. As a laundry attendant, picks up, receives, sorts, counts, inspects, folds, ties and bags laundry ; checks incoming laundry for identification marking ; pre-rinses heavily soiled items ; operates washing machines and clothes dryer; Sorts laundered articles according to identify marking for distribution. April 2008 – Feb 2010 Subway Fast food restaurant - Panama City Beach, FL (Food Counter Person Attendant Position) Duties&Responsibilites : Preparing sandwiches, pizza, salad and other foods. Serve cumtomers at the counter. Prepare mis-en-place. Clean kitchen and service area. Stock refrigerators and salad bars and keep records of the quantities of food used - receive payment….. Mar 2009 – Sep 2010 Day Inn Hotel/ Paradise Palm Resort – Panama City Beach, FL (Hotel Employee Driver Position) References : Mr. Glicerio bonn Villanueva – House landlord in Chicago, IL Tel. 773 *** **** Ms. Lisa Johnson - Front Desk Manager [Paradise Palm Resort, Panama City, FL] Tel. 850 *** **** Mr. Rick Amora -Restaurant Owner [Food corner, Panama City, FL] Tel. 850 *** **** ___________________________ Show Contact Info Send Message Free
